name: CAPACOCHA
description:
Capacocha is the ultimate couch game for you and your friends!

Capacocha is a forgotten pre-columbian ballgame where 2 teams are pitched against one another in heated matches.

Taking place in a circular arena where the goal cages are orbiting around the field, you win by throwing balls, friends and foes alike in the opposing goal to score the most points!

This beta version of Capacocha features:

  • 4 players in local multiplayer.
  • Quick games of 3 minutes each.
  • Free for now, will be updated soon :)

Contact: @TurbotFish , @FreizZed , @CDevRom or @flojuch on twitter
